actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of potential water resource development at the McGee Creek Reservoir project in Atoka County, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.
